name: OS X Gather Keychain Enumeration
author: ipwnstuff <e@ipwnstuff.com>
joev <joev@metasploit.com>
description:
This module presents a way to quickly go through the current user's keychains and
        collect data such as email accounts, servers, and other services.  Please note:
        when using the GETPASS and GETPASS_AUTO_ACCEPT option, the user may see an authentication
        alert flash briefly on their screen that gets dismissed by a programmatically triggered click.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: FileDropperDelay
options.description: Delay in seconds before attempting cleanup

options.name: GETPASS_AUTO_ACCEPT
options.description: Attempt to auto-accept any prompts when collecting passwords.

options.name: GETPASS_TIMEOUT
options.description: Maximum time to wait on all passwords to be dumped.
